c74object.name: sp.gridmatch
c74object.digest: Find the nearest match in a pre-analyzed corpus
c74object.description: Find the nearest match in a pre-analyzed corpus.
c74object.discussion: Open the Overview Patch The sp.gridmatch object finds the nearest match in a corpus based on a grid-ified XY space. You can load/use the same corpora as you would with sp.corpusmatch but instead of matching based on incoming audio descriptors you can match using XY coordinates from a controller or UI object.

outlet.digest: Dict output for sp.plotter or sp.eraetouch
outlet.description: Dict output for sp.plotter or sp.eraetouch.

method.name: corpus
method.description: Messages related to corpus matching. After sending the corpus message you send an argument of 'match' followed by a time-scale you wish to match against. The available options are: short = the first 256 samples (at 44.1k sample rate) medium = the first 4410 samples (at 44.1k sample rate) all = the entire file Therefore a complete message would look as follows: 'corpus match all' or 'corpus match small'

method.name: info
method.digest: Print corpus metatdata/info to Max console
method.description: Prints a summary of the corpus metatdata/info to the Max console.

method.name: load
method.description: Opens file dialog to select pre-trained concat .json file.

method.name: read
method.description: Reads a pre-trained concat .json file directly from a relative or absolute path.

method.name: print
method.digest: Print dataset contents to Max console
method.description: Prints a summary of the descriptors in the dataset to the Max console.

attribute.name: roundrobin
attribute.description: Enables round robin sample matching so when a match is found twice in a row, a randomized selection is made within a window of options. The available options are: 0 = round robin selection is off 1 = round robin selection is on (default 5 nearest neighbors) 2+ = sets the amount of nearest neighbors
